formatted_address: 585 N Bridge Rd, Level 12 Raffles Hospital, Singapore 188770
name: Raffles Executive Medical Centre

reviews.text: The receptionist checked my appointment confirmation form and without properly reading it and tried telling me the doctors were busy and I had to come another day. I asked her to check again and then she realized her mistake and proceeded to help me. If you don’t ask them to check their mistakes they will waste your time. A doctor later entered an incorrect weight into an important application and I only happened to double check. Not sure what’s wrong with everyone here.
Tourist here. I was very hapy, everyting is organized and profesional. Doctor and nurse were very kind. Thank you!

Been doing my medical screening for >4 years over here. Friendliest staff I’ve ever met, even the doctors. Waiting time is to be expected depending on the day, but their service clearly is top notch ! Kudos to the team !

It takes a lot of time to receive medicines I have visited here multiple times (bcoz of insurance). But everytime I have to wait for more then an hour to collect my medicines. Somehow today was a bit quick. But then I forgot to collect or doc forgot to provide me with the medical Certificate. So to fix this, I have been calling every number given to me. Its  more then an hour. And its frustrating to have no response.

I was here for my routine health check. The staffs here are kind, friendly and patient. Information provided are also very clear. The doctor who attends to me is alao very attentive and knowledgable. Both staff and doctors are willing to go the extra mile for their patient.

vicinity: 585 North Bridge Road, Level 12 Raffles Hospital
